Class MoreAsserts

extends Object
    Useful test assertions.

    • Method Detail

      • assertThrows

        public static <T extends Throwable> T assertThrows(Class<T> thrownType,
                                                   MoreAsserts.Block block)
        Assert that the given block throws. The type of exception thrown must be an instance of the given type or else the assertion fails. If the block does not throw anything, the assertion also fails.
        Parameters:
        thrownType - the expected type of what is thrown
        block - the block that should throw
        Returns:
        the exception thrown by the given block

      • assertNotEquals

        public static <T> void assertNotEquals(T t1,
                                       T t2)
        Asserts that the given two values are not equal.
        Parameters:
        t1 - a value
        t2 - another value

      • assertNotEquals

        public static <T> void assertNotEquals(String message,
                                       T t1,
                                       T t2)
        Asserts that the given two values are not equal.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message if the assertion fails
        t1 - a value
        t2 - another value
